about_the_game:
"Dragoon Ascension Demo" is a 2D Party-Based RPG inspired by the Final Fantasy series. Once the most prominent kingdom in the world, Windfall has been in a gradual decline over the years. To amend the mistakes of past nobility, Duke Vergo plans on promoting your character to be the commander of the Royal Guard. This promotion is conditional upon completing the necessary training to become a dragoon. Will you be the first to ascend to this rank?

COMPLETE BOUNTIES

Eliminate specific enemies of the kingdom to receive rewards, such as gold and items. As you complete more bounties, you'll unlock new bounties and other perks for helping the kingdom.

FIGHT IN THE ARENA

Battle enemies that are exclusive to the arena. Unlock a new challenge mode and work towards obtaining rare items.

KEY FEATURES

  • Active time progress battle system

  • Learn new abilities from gaining levels, as well as from items

  • Side quests and activities, such as the arena

  • Explore the first dungeon and defeat the boss to make Windfall prominent once again

name: Dragoon Ascension Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Dragoon Ascension is a Party-Based RPG that strikes a balance between adventure and combat. Defeat enemies and witness the rise of the kingdom of Windfall. Find tomes that the Ancients left behind to learn their secrets. Become the ultimate weapon.
